name: Cloak of the Reanimated
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ *** This cloak comes in 6 different types. Each are made in the same way, apart from the Soul that determines the type of cloak you wish to make. The Reanimator's Cloak can be found in the Crypt of Home dungeon and the items to upgrade it to a Cloak of the Reanimated drop off the Escaped Prisoners in Milky Way. You will only need 1 Soul to make the base cloak. To further upgrade it you will need 4 of each type. *** #L "Reanimator's Cloak" "245260" #L "Soul of the Jester" "274653" #L "Soul of the Ranger" "274654" #L "Soul of the Summoner" "274651" #L "Soul of the Healer" "274656" #L "Soul of the Gladiator" "274655" #L "Soul of the Illusionist" "274652" #L "Empty Spirit Vest" "274646" #L "Soul Ripper" "274650" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ The Base Cloak of the Reanimated XXX: Reanimator's Cloak + Soul Ripper = #L "Explosion of Light" "274728" Skills: | ? | Note: Right clicking the Explosion of light will result in: #L "Soul of the Reanimator" "274649" and #L "Grey Cloak" "274647" Note: At this point you will set the type of your Cloak. Use the Soul of XXX (any of the 6 types) on your Soul of the Reanimator to make a Cloak of that type. Soul of the Reanimator + Soul of the Jester = #L "Soul of the Reanimated Jester" "274660" Skills: | ? | Empty Spirit Vest + Soul of the Reanimated Jester = #L "Jester's Spirit Vest" "274668" Grey Cloak + Jester's Spirit Vest = #L "Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (1/5)" "274718" ------------------------------ Upgrading the Cloak of the Reanimated XXX: Soul of the Ranger + Soul of the Gladiator = #L "Dull Combined Soul Crystal" "274723" Dull Combined Soul Crystal + Soul of the Healer = #L "Dim Combined Soul Crystal" "274724" Dim Combined Soul Crystal + Soul of the Summoner = #L "Sparkling Combined Soul Crystal" "274725" Sparkling Combined Soul Crystal + Soul of the Illusionist = #L "Shining Combined Soul Crystal" "274726" Shining Combined Soul Crystal + Soul of the Jester = #L "Awakened Soul Crystal" "274727" Repeat this step 4 times to end up with 4 Awakened Soul Crystals. Now apply them to you cloak. Awakened Soul Crystal + Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (1/5) = #L "Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (2/5)" "274719" Awakened Soul Crystal + Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (2/5) = #L "Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (3/5)" "274720" Awakened Soul Crystal + Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (3/5) = #L "Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (4/5)" "274721" Awakened Soul Crystal + Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (4/5) = #L "Cloak of the Reanimated Jester (5/5)" "274722"
